name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Data Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in database administration, ETL processes, and data warehousing, leveraging my expertise in **SQL Server**, **SQL Server Integrated Services**, and **Cloud Data Warehousing** to deliver high-quality data solutions. Proficient in **Microsoft Fabric** and **Power BI**, I focus on relational database design and ensuring high availability and disaster recovery for critical systems. My proficiency in **Python** enables me to implement robust data pipelines and perform efficient data manipulation.
Alongside my technical skills, I have a solid background in communication and problem-solving, fostering collaboration in teams and refining my attention to detail in complex projects. My versatile experience also includes building high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors, utilizing cutting-edge technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have a strong foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, ensuring that solutions comply with standards of security and data integrity.
